# Minimal constraints to keep pip resolver fast on Python 3.12.
# These packages have massive dependency graphs that otherwise cause hours
# of backtracking when installing ingestion + Airflow extras.
gcsfs==2023.12.0
fsspec==2023.12.0
google-cloud-storage==2.10.0
kubernetes==29.0.0
exasol-integration-test-docker-environment==3.4.0

# gRPC and Protobuf packages
# Dagster 1.12.2 supports protobuf>=4,<7 which is compatible with opentelemetry-exporter-otlp 1.37.0
grpcio>=1.63.2
protobuf>=5.26.1,<7

# Snowflake connector - causes backtracking through many patch versions
snowflake-connector-python==3.17.4
# cryptography pinned to <43 due to pyOpenSSL 24.1.0 requirement (used by databricks)
cryptography>=42.0.0,<43
pynacl==1.6.0

# Azure packages - prevent backtracking through many versions
azure-storage-blob==12.25.1
msal==1.34.0

# SQLAlchemy database adapters - prevent backtracking
sqlalchemy-hana==3.0.3
# pyexasol pinned to 0.26.x for compatibility with sqlalchemy-exasol 5.x (requires pyexasol<1)
pyexasol>=0.26.0,<1

# Authentication and JWT packages - prevent massive backtracking
PyJWT==2.10.1
oracledb==1.4.2

# Locust for load testing (Python 3.12+)
# Pin exact version to prevent backtracking through patch versions
locust==2.32.10

# Workflow orchestration packages
# Dagster 1.12.2+ supports protobuf 5/6, making it compatible with opentelemetry-exporter-otlp 1.37.0
dagster>=1.12.2
dagster-graphql>=1.12.2
dagster-webserver>=1.12.2
dagster-pipes>=1.12.2
